frontmatter.name: Can I start before I join?

nodes.html: While you can explore ideas, you cannot start implementing your project before the specified time.

frontmatter.name: Do I have to study Computer Science?

nodes.html: Nope! You don't have even have to know how to program, though it obviously helps.
Â£0 and your weekend. Royal Hackaway is free to attend with everything provided by our wonderful sponsors!

frontmatter.name: Do I need to come with a team?

nodes.html: We'll be making teams after our opening ceremonies, so no pressure! You can if you want, but no more than five hackers per team.
Hackathons are programming competitions where people work together to make something cool over the course of a weekend.
Anyone 18+ who is either a current university student or has graduated in the past six months.
You and your team own anything you create. We recommend making it open source on GitHub.
